=====================================
Sumti: la'e/le'e/lo'e starter coverage
=====================================

la'e le bajra cu klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (lahe) (sumti (le) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla))))) (ku)?) (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla)))))

le'e bajra cu klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (lee) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla))))) (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla)))))

lo'e bajra cu klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (loe) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla))))) (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla)))))
